execution_quality: Agent quickly read the relevant file and made an edit to address the error in 17 seconds, demonstrating focused problem-solving. However, the follow-up reveals the fix only partially addressed the issue—the crash was resolved but new problems emerged (startup delay, connection issues).
work_category: Debugging a crash/traceback error in the eris application, identifying and attempting to fix the underlying issue causing failure on startup.
summary: Agent fixed the crash error that user reported, but the solution only addressed one layer of the problem. While the application now starts without crashing, user-reported startup delays and connection failures remain unresolved, requiring further investigation into root causes.
follow_up_pattern: User reported the immediate crash is fixed but revealed secondary issues (startup delay, connection/send failures), indicating the fix was incomplete or masked deeper problems.
